topic: The historical evolution and unintended application of doped oxide catalysts: Exploring the role of impurities and additives in shaping catalytic processes before formal recognition of the doping concept
QuestionEnglish: How have impurities and additives in oxide catalysts contributed to the unintentional use of doped oxide catalysts throughout the history of catalysis, and what implications does this historical perspective have for our current understanding of catalytic processes and the development of modern catalyst design?
QuestionChinese: 在催化历史中，氧化物催化剂中的杂质和添加剂如何促进了掺杂氧化物催化剂的无意使用，这种历史视角对我们当前理解催化过程和现代催化剂设计的发展有何影响？
